attributes.name: Certainty
attributes.description: The certainty that this event happen (value between 0 to 1)

attributes.name: OccurrenceTime
attributes.description: No value means it equals the event detection time, other option is to use one of the defined distribution functions with parameters

attributes.name: ExpirationTime
attributes.description: Only till this time the cost and certainty parameters of the event are valid, and only till this time a proactive action is considered

attributes.name: Cost
attributes.description: The cost of this event occurrence. Negative if this is an opportunity

attributes.name: Duration
attributes.description: Used in case the this event occur within an interval
